snippet.title: DUCKSIDE | Announcement Trailer | Sign up for the Beta now!
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2682580/DUCKSIDE/
🦆 Sign-up for Beta NOW ☝️ 

Welcome to DUCKSIDE, a persistent world survival game where you step into the webbed feet of hat wearing, weapon wielding, combat ready Ducks.

DUCKSIDE is a persistent world survival game like DayZ or RUST featuring PVP, PVE, deep, intuitive crafting and base building systems and will be hosting a beta from April 18th, which players can sign up to take part in now on Steam.

https://twitter.com/PlayDUCKSIDE
https://www.instagram.com/playduckside/
https://www.facebook.com/PlayDUCKSIDE/
